text: Are there examples anywhere of overlaying 2D text on a 3D view, where the text stays in the same place in the window irrespective of the way the 3D scene view changes? I.e. what you usually see for FPS (frames-per-second) displays (which is my initial use case).

elements.text: Are there examples anywhere of overlaying 2D text on a 3D view, where the text stays in the same place in the window irrespective of the way the 3D scene view changes? I.e. what you usually see for FPS (frames-per-second) displays (which is my initial use case).

text: Ah, thanks, I'll try that, and maybe contribute an example to the gallery.
